metadata.name: Microsoft Defender Blocked from Loading Unsigned DLL
metadata.comment: Detects Code Integrity (CI) engine blocking Microsoft Defender's processes (MpCmdRun and NisSrv) from loading unsigned DLLs which may be an attempt to sideload arbitrary DLL

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND ((lower(LOWER(metadata.event_code)) in (11, 12)) AND (endswith(lower(process.file.path), lower('\\mpcmdrun.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.file.path), lower('\\nissrv.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects Code Integrity (CI) engine blocking Microsoft Defender's processes (MpCmdRun and NisSrv) from loading unsigned DLLs which may be an attempt to sideload arbitrary DLL
